name: Balancing Act - VR
description:
I've been coding little games here and there with a really small game engine, but after a while I really wanted to make something. It took me a while, but I finished this little guy finally and fulfilled a dream of sorts by publishing it! Thank goodness for Unity, and thank goodness for online question and answer forums!

Balancing Act is a VR game where you stack 3D shapes as high as you can without them falling over.  Stack in Arcade mode where shapes stacked will freeze in place, and each new shape has a time limit before it drops to your doom! Or just play Casual, and stack with no added timer or excitement.  Get a high score and compare it with your friends! - Balancing Act is playable on an Oculus Rift or an HTC Vive.

 This game requires having the SteamVR software installed.
